body_html:
@jart pkg-config isn't doable nicely yet with bazel. I'm waiting on bazelbuild/bazel#5188 and bazelbuild/bazel#5186

I was going to expand the rules and iterate in later PRs once this patch set is merged. This one is already huge and gets merge conflicts all over the place. I have to keep rebasing the core parts every few days. Once the main parts are in, future changes will be much easier and less invasive.

body:
@jart pkg-config isn't doable nicely yet with bazel. I'm waiting on https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/5188 and https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/5186

I was going to expand the rules and iterate in later PRs once this patch set is merged. This one is already huge and gets merge conflicts all over the place. I have to keep rebasing the core parts every few days. Once the main parts are in, future changes will be much easier and less invasive.
